Name: ApiGatewayAccount
Documentation: The AWS::ApiGateway::Account resource specifies the AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that Amazon API Gateway (API Gateway) uses to write API logs to Amazon CloudWatch Logs (CloudWatch Logs).

Parameters.Name: CloudWatchRoleArn
Parameters.Documentation: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role that has write access to CloudWatch Logs in your account.
